timeline.message:
tlsdebug: replace hardcoded colour

Use the background colour of the text field instead of hardcoding white.

Part of zaproxy/zaproxy#5542.

Signed-off-by: thc202 <thc202@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Why create a new Color? Doesn't getColor return one?
timeline.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText: It does but the returned Color is a UIResource too, so the  ComponentUI would handle it as if it was a default colour and could ignore it (e.g. SynthStyle#getColor).
replies.author: thc202
